recipe.title: Fantasy / Reality Toast (Pisces) Recipe by Tasty

steps.step: Peel the avocado, then slice very thinly crosswise. Starting from one end, fan out the sliced avocado in straight line, then curl into a ring shape.
Spread the mayonnaise over the slice of toast. Top with the radish slices. Carefully transfer the avocado ring to the toast and decorate with edible flowers
